summary:
After 8 years of auditing at PricewaterhouseCoopers I became a Financial Manager - CFO to focus more on adding more value to a smaller amount of clients.

Currently with almost 20 years of experience in the financial field I am an experienced Chief Financial Officer with a demonstrated history of working in organizations that are in the start- or scale-up phase. I am a strong finance professional skilled in Financial Accounting, Team Building, Management, Restructuring and Streamlining Processes and HR.

I am passionate about helping start-ups and scale-ups into their next phase and ensuring that their corporate governance and finance is ready for their next steps. I am always looking for new opportunities.

With my degree as Registeraccountant, but my experience in start- and scale-ups I show a overall control of the finance departments without loosing sight of the details that are still important in those organizations. I am resourceful and understand that sometimes practical solutions are preferred above theoretical ones.

I believe that I add value to companies by bringing a professional and practical mindset, without loosing side of the company's culture.

If I can be of help in any way, then please contact me by e-mail brianspaans@hotmail.com.

The boardroom can be a physical boardroom, for example at the client's or our offices at Willemsparkweg 96 in Amsterdam; and we also provide a digital boardroom. By working with the Financial Boardroom Amsterdam, clients can rely on professionals with whom they discuss strategic decisions, both with regard to business and private financial matters. The organisation and its network have a vast wealth of expertise. Based on this expertise, we can solve national and international accountancy, tax and civil-law matters.

* Traditional: fully compliant via a one-stop shop solution

Financial Boardroom Amsterdam is a traditional firm of accountants and tax consultants. As a full service office, we ensure that our clients comply with all their audit and tax obligations. In other words, thanks to our one-stop shop approach, our clients are fully compliant.

* Modern: up to date and 'sounding board function'

The company distinguishes itself by anticipating on various developments that are drastically changing the field of accountancy and tax advice. These include: automation; knowledge sharing; internationalisation and compliance with laws and regulations.

Financial Boardroom Amsterdam uses advanced software and modern applications. Nowadays, bookkeeping and compliance with audit and tax obligations is less labour intensive. This means the work can be performed more efficiently. As a result financial information can be reported more accurate.

* What does this mean for the client?

Based on this vision, we relieve the client of all their concerns regarding compliance, and offer the best possible advise.

This implies that the client:
• is always up to date on their financial situation,
• has access to their financial information, anytime and anywhere
• is fully compliant with regard to all audit and tax obligations
• receives custom made advise", 'title': 'CPA', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 31920, 'name': 'NCOI', 'logo':
